name: Alec Bradley - Sanctum - Robusto
additionalNotes: Alec Bradley Sanctum is handcrafted in Honduras and features a distinct complexity. Honduran wrappers cover a rich, multinational pairing of long-filler tobaccos from Costa Rica, Colombia, Honduras and Nicaragua. The medium to full-bodied profile reveals notes of wood, leather and black pepper with zesty hints of fruit. Splendid construction results in a pleasurable burn to deliver a tasteful finish. Sanctum is a great addition into the regular rotation of Alec Bradley fans.
